title: wangdengfeng
author: wangdengfeng
content: Let me introduce myself first. I am from China. I have nearly a year of maintenance experience and can maintain the mining machines of the Whatsminer Ant series. I am currently working in a mine in Paraguay. Due to visa issues, I may have to leave next month. , due to language problems, it is difficult for me to find other mining farms' needs for mining machine maintenance, so I come here for help

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Language problems? You mean English? Google Translate's here?  The EU might offer you some havens, depending on the languages you can speak. Despite many doomsayers prophesying unaffordable energy there, there should be no shortage of mines for you to work with there.
